description: Updates the configuration and settings of an existing OpenSearch application.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the OpenSearch application to be updated.

parameters.name: dataSources
parameters.description: The data sources to associate with the OpenSearch application. (dict) --- Data sources that are associated with an OpenSearch Application. dataSourceArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information. dataSourceDescription (string) --- Detailed description of a data source.

nested_params.name: dataSourceArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_params.name: dataSourceDescription
nested_params.description: Detailed description of a data source.

parameters.name: appConfigs
parameters.description: The configuration settings to modify for the OpenSearch application. (dict) --- Configuration settings for an OpenSearch application. For more information, see see Using the OpenSearch user interface in Amazon OpenSearch Service. key (string) --- The configuration item to set, such as the admin role for the OpenSearch application. value (string) --- The value assigned to the configuration key, such as an IAM user ARN.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The configuration item to set, such as the admin role for the OpenSearch application.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value assigned to the configuration key, such as an IAM user ARN.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the updated OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the updated OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: dataSources
nested_items.description: The data sources associated with the updated OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: dataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: dataSourceDescription
nested_items.description: Detailed description of a data source.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterOptions
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity Center configuration for the updated OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether IAM Identity Center is enabled for the OpenSearch Application.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: iamRoleForIdentityCenterApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role assigned to the IAM Identity Center application for the OpenSearch Application.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: appConfigs
nested_items.description: The configuration settings for the updated OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The configuration item to set, such as the admin role for the OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the configuration key, such as an IAM user ARN.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the OpenSearch application was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the OpenSearch application was last updated.
